item.description:
We will be hiking on Friday, Dec. 28th due to an inclement forecast for Thursday night.  Hopefully it will be bright and beautiful on Friday night.  It will also be in the low twenties so please dress warmly. 

Directions:  From Long Pond Rd. travel west on Halfway Pond for 1.6 miles.  Turn left and travel .3 miles.  The cranberry bogs are on the right-hand side of the road.  There is ample parking.

See you soon.
item.how_to_find_us: Bogs are on the right hand side at 64 Wareham Rd.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Cold Moon Hike on Friday night, Dec. 28th
